issue.title: [C++] Enable option to build arrow with minimal dependencies needed to build Parquet library
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1186](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1186). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As discussed in https://github.com/apache/parquet-cpp/pull/366, the scope of this JIRA is to enable a build option in Arrow to enable minimal transitive dependencies required for Parquet.
